src:
蔡依林求婚阿信還訂下時間　網友嗨喊：陳太太
04 Nov 2019, 01:24 by 朱晉緯
台灣天團五月天昨（3日）在上海舉辦演唱會，蔡依林不僅驚喜現身，還現場邀請阿信在明年1月5日「和她約會」，揚言若答應的話「今天就嫁給你」，最後阿信答應了，蔡依林爽朗回應「今天，嫁給你！」接著兩人共同熱唱《今天你要嫁給我》，並做出甜蜜的舞蹈動作、深情對望。
五月天3日的上海演唱會中，同樣來自台灣的蔡依林驚喜現身舞台，並且直接邀請五月天「跟她約會一下」，日期就訂在1月5號，想要跟他們在小巨蛋約會，阿信此時吃醋地表示「一次跟5個人約會嗎？」，蔡依林則故意幽默回應「我喜歡跟5個人同時約會」。
蔡依林再次確認阿信的想法，詢問「你答應我了嗎？」「你答應我的話，我今天就嫁給你！」引起現場觀眾一陣驚呼，最後阿信默默答應請求，並說「今天真的很舒服」，蔡依林也爽朗的回應「今天，嫁給你！」


阿信與蔡依林的親密舞動惹得現場觀眾尖叫連連。（翻攝蔡依林臉書）



阿信與蔡依林的親密舞動惹得現場觀眾尖叫連連。（翻攝蔡依林臉書）



阿信與蔡依林的親密舞動惹得現場觀眾尖叫連連。（翻攝蔡依林臉書）

蔡依林與阿信接著在舞台共同熱唱《今天你要嫁給我》，兩人還合體舞蹈，阿信將蔡依林摟入懷中，僅用一隻手將蔡依林在空中撐著，並且深情對望，讓許多粉絲尖叫不已。
蔡依林事後也分享了她和阿信合舞照，貼文一出，引來大批粉絲興奮地喊她是「陳太太」，更紛紛留言「11/3新婚愉快，1/5回台北辦喜宴」、「這畫面真的太甜太美了，王子和公主要官宣了嗎？」、「1/5 指定合唱歌曲：腦公」、「一月五號的喜帖呢？」、「這個角度好讓人心臟撲通撲通跳」、「陳太太要幸福喔」。
更新時間｜2019.11.04 01:42
text:
Jolin Tsai asked for a letter and also set a time. Netizen shouted: Mrs. Chen
04 Nov 2019, 01:24 by Zhu Jinwei
Taiwan Tiantuan Mayday (3rd) held a concert in Shanghai. Jolin Tsai not only presented a surprise, but also invited Ashin to "date her" on January 5th next year, threatening to marry you today if promised. Finally Ashin agreed, and Jolin Tsai responded with a good response to "Today, marry you!" Then the two sang together "You are going to marry me today" and make sweet dance moves and affectionately.
In the Shanghai concert on May 3rd, Jolin Tsai, also from Taiwan, was surprised to appear on the stage, and directly invited Mayday to "date her". The date was set on January 5th, and I wanted to date them at the Little Dome. At this time, jealously said "Is it a date with 5 people?", Jolin Tsai deliberately responded humorously "I like to date with 5 people."
Jolin Tsai reconfirmed Ashin’s thoughts and asked, “Are you promised me?” “You promised me, I will marry you today!” caused the audience to exclaim, and finally Ashin silently agreed to the request and said, “Today’s true. Very comfortable," Jolin Tsai also responded heartily "Today, marry you!"


The intimate dance of Ashin and Jolin Tsai provoked the audience to scream again and again. (Review of Jolin Tsai Facebook)



The intimate dance of Ashin and Jolin Tsai provoked the audience to scream again and again. (Review of Jolin Tsai Facebook)



The intimate dance of Ashin and Jolin Tsai provoked the audience to scream again and again. (Review of Jolin Tsai Facebook)

Jolin Tsai and Ashin went on stage together to sing "You are going to marry me today". The two also danced together. Ashin put Jolin Tsai into his arms and held Jolin Tsai in the air with one hand, and he was deeply affectionate. Many fans are screaming.
Jolin Tsai also shared her and Ashin’s dance photos afterwards. After posting a large number of fans, she was excited to call her "Mrs. Chen" and even wrote a message "11/3 happy wedding, 1/5 return to Taipei wedding reception" "This picture is really too sweet and beautiful. Did the prince and the public official announce it?", "1/5 designated chorus song: brain public", "January 5th wedding invitation?", "This angle is good." The heart of the human heart thumps and jumps, and "Mrs. Chen wants to be happy."
Update time|2019.11.04 01:42
